p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
In fact it works when focus is in Text Field or Text area but not in other cases.
Issue also happens with Oracle JDK on Windows

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Issue is due to javax.swing.ToolTipManager already registering this same shortcut for some components for accessibility.
Debugging I see it is receiving CTRL+F1 event and trying to show tip.

Maybe we should change shortcut to something else:
- Shift+F1
- Ctrl+Alt+F1
